description: A group of people in a canoe are shown cheerfully approaching the precipice of a very tall, cascading waterfall, seemingly unaware of the imminent danger. The scene is darkly absurd, juxtaposing the catastrophic situation with the simple, repetitive lyrics of a song about rowing. The irony underscores their obliviousness as they continue their mundane activity towards a likely fatal outcome. The vast scale of the waterfall contrasts starkly with the small canoe and its occupants.
caption: ... and then the second group comes in—'row, row, row your boat'...
